mapper.insert: insert into blog_member ( userid, userpw, username, email) values(#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{email})
mapper.select: select unum, userid, userpw, username, email, rdate from blog_member where unum = #{unum}
select unum, userid, userpw, username, email, rdate from blog_member where unum > 0 order by unum desc, rdate desc
select userid, username from blog_member where userid = #{userid} and userpw = #{userpw}
select userid from blog_member where userid=#{userid}
